import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ProductContext } from '../../contexts/ProductContext'; const CartTotal = () => { const { clearCart } = useContext(ProductContext); const { cartSubTotal, cartTotal, cartTax } = cart; console.log(cartSubTotal) return (
subtotal : $ {cartSubTotal}
tax : $ {cartTax}
total : $ {cartTotal}
); } export default CartTotal;
